titleStmt.title: Eglogs epytaphes, and sonettes. Newly written by Barnabe Googe: 1563. 15. Marche
titleStmt.author: Googe, Barnabe, 1540-1594.
Blundeston, Laurence.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Colwell, for Raffe Newbery, dwelyng in Fleetstrete a litle aboue the Conduit in the late shop of Thomas Bartelet,

notesStmt.note: Edited by Laurence Blundeston, whose name appears in the heading of the preface.
Signatures: A B⁴; ² A-B C (C8+"c3") D⁴ E-K.
With a final colophon and errata leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Fleetstrete a litle aboue the Conduit in the late shop of Thomas Bartelet
